Class AuthorizationSessionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.web.service.AuthorizationSessionService

  • @Component
public class AuthorizationSessionService
extends java.lang.Object
    authorization session management BL, Holds and manage the LogedIn users session for all users and machines

                                           java.lang.String accountId,
                                           java.lang.String machineId)
        Decide whether the AuthorizationSessionValid, basic implementation, just see that the token exist, and owned by the correct user and machine, ignore the timestamp for now
        Parameters:

        accountId -
        machineId -
        Returns:
        true if the AuthorizationSession is found and valid
